Gecko

GECKO is a gesture recognition software that allows the user a basic control of the computer's cursor and click functionalities, as well as launching user-defined commands.

  • More info: Link
  • Date: January 2014
  • Category: Software

ABBlind

¡Desecha tus prejuicios audiófilos! Con ABBlind podrás hacer pruebas a doble ciego para saber si realmente escuchas diferencias de calidad entre tu viejo equipo de audio y ese nuevo pepino de 1000€ que te quieren vender. ¿Merece la pena la compra? ¡Averígualo con ABBlind!

  • More info: Link
  • Date: Octubre 2015
  • Category: Hardware

PyQt / PySide

In this tutorial we will learn how to create a PySide/PyQt application. For that purpose, I will make a walkthrough of the creation of a graphical interface for the PCB outline creator for KiCad. The PCB outline creator is a small tool to add PCB outlines with some given dimensions (and rounded corners) to a KiCad file. It is included in the kicad-library repository.

  • More info: Link
  • Date: November 2015
  • Category: Software
